Aphari IT Multi-Sourcing Service Performance Framework Accelerator

Aphari helps organisations transform their IT operating model, adopt cloud services, implement multi source delivery models, establish systems integration and service integration (SIAM) capabilities. Our service performance framework accelerator service helps customers establish a performance framework to support the multi-source environment, ensuring a robust and consistent approach to service measurement.

Features

  • Definition of service performance approach against integrated best practice framework.
  • Identifies key business services to be subject to performance regime.
  • Definition of service categories and measurement approaches.
  • Identifies critical measurement points and tools required for availability management.
  • Identifies measures for ITIL processes including Incident Management.
  • Definition of service credit and apportionment model across towers.
  • Links measurements to service maps, ensuring capable underpinning IT services.
  • Conducted by multi-disciplinary team, with extensive supply-side multi-sourced delivery experience.
  • Deep expertise across all commercial, technical, security, and service domains.
  • Our framework includes MOP, MSP/PRINCE, COBIT, TOGAF, ITIL, CCS guidance.

Benefits

  • Enables effective performance management across multi source supplier base.
  • Enables performance measurement during transition states and target state.
  • Informs requirements for necessary measurement and monitoring tooling.
  • Highlights specific service management risks arising from multi-vendor service environments.
  • Recommends techniques and approaches for mitigating delivery and service risks.
  • Helps organisations transform their IT operating model and supply chain.
  • Our methods and techniques proven in complex multi-supplier environments.
  • Our holistic approach speaks to stakeholders in their own language.
  • Aphari provide techniques and knowledge to minimise customer's risks.
